forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of an isolated thunderstorm during the morning, then windy this afternoon with occasional showers. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 45F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
